summary: This document is a collection of official Bureau of Prisons count sheets and inmate rosters from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York on August 8, 2019. It records inmate counts, out-counts, and specific inmate assignments, including a roster showing Jeffrey Epstein was in the ATTY (attorney visit) area that day.

events.title: Daily Prison Counts and Out-Counts
events.description: Routine administrative count of inmates at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, including out-counts for inmates in specific areas like hospital, attorney visits, and other assignments.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein, with inmate registration number 76318-054, was recorded as being in the ATTY (attorney visit) area of the Metropolitan Correctional Center on August 8, 2019.
The document shows multiple official inmate count sheets and rosters for MCC New York on August 8, 2019, indicating standard prison administrative procedures.
Several inmates are noted with 'SUICIDE OR' (Suicide Observation) status in their assignment codes.
The total inmate population count for the facility on this date was recorded as 759 during one count verification.
The documents include out-count forms for inmates in specific locations such as HOSP (hospital), FNYS, FNYE, FS, and ATTY.
